sentence: Why is the universe expanding? It needs more space.
explanation: A physical area or expanse. The astronauts ventured deeper into space to study distant galaxies.
first_new_sentence: He needed more space from his friends to focus on his work.

sentence: How do you know if theres an atheist on a reddit thread? Dont worry, theyll let you know.
explanation: To allow, permit, or grant. She will let you borrow her book for the weekend.
first_new_sentence: They had to let the team go after declining performances.

sentence: My grandfather was diagnosed with alzheimers and severe dandruff... Hes been really flaky lately.
explanation: Easily broken or falling into flakes. The pastry had a flaky texture that was delightful.
first_new_sentence: His flaky behavior made it hard for friends to rely on him.

sentence: The jokes were chosen based on the dual meanings of the highlighted words. Each word maintains the same spelling for both meanings while also qualifying as a single word found in the dictionary. The new sentences provide context for both meanings of the selected words.
